About Design Dot

Passionate about coffee, committed to quality, dedicated to sustainability

Our Story

Design Dot was born from a simple belief: everyone deserves access to exceptional coffee. Founded in 2020 by a group of coffee enthusiasts, we set out to bridge the gap between coffee producers and coffee lovers around the world.

What started as a small operation sourcing beans from a single farm in Ethiopia has grown into a global network of partnerships with coffee farmers across Africa, Central America, and South America. But our mission remains the same – to deliver the finest coffee while ensuring fair compensation for the hardworking farmers who make it all possible.

☕

Our Values

🌱

Sustainability

We're committed to environmental sustainability and supporting farming practices that protect our planet for future generations.

🤝

Fair Trade

We work directly with farmers to ensure they receive fair compensation and have the resources to improve their communities.

⭐

Quality

We never compromise on quality. Every bean is carefully selected, roasted to perfection, and delivered fresh to your door.

📚

Education

We believe in sharing knowledge about coffee culture, brewing techniques, and the stories behind each cup.

Meet Our Team

👩‍💼

Sarah Chen

Founder & CEO

Coffee enthusiast with 15 years in the specialty coffee industry. Sarah's passion for connecting farmers with consumers drives our mission.

👨‍🔬

Marcus Rodriguez

Head Roaster

Award-winning roaster with expertise in bringing out the unique characteristics of beans from different regions around the world.

👩‍🌾

Elena Omondi

Sourcing Director

Based in Nairobi, Elena works directly with farmers across Africa to establish sustainable partnerships and ensure quality sourcing.

👨‍💻

David Kim

Head of Customer Experience

Dedicated to ensuring every customer has an exceptional experience from subscription to that perfect first sip.

Our Impact

250+
Partner Farmers
12
Countries
50,000+
Happy Customers
$500K+
Paid Above Fair Trade

Through our partnerships, we've helped fund education programs, infrastructure improvements, and sustainable farming initiatives in coffee-growing communities worldwide.

Join Our Journey

Ready to experience exceptional coffee while making a positive impact? Join thousands of coffee lovers who have made Design Dot part of their daily ritual.

Start Your Subscription Get in Touch
